```{r}
library(tidyverse)

data("iris")
ggplot(iris, aes(x = Sepal.Length, y = Petal.Length, color = Species)) + 
  geom_point(size = 2) + 
  theme_classic() + 
  labs(title = "Plot Title")

cor.test(iris$Sepal.Lengthm, iris$Petal.Length)
```
